style_guide.visual_style: High-quality Korean webtoon style with clean digital illustration, soft natural colors, expressive faces, modern fashion, atmospheric lighting
style_guide.segment_story: A conversation between a female passenger and male taxi driver in Seoul at night. The woman hails a taxi, confirms it's available, gets in, and requests to go to Gangnam Station. After asking about travel time and receiving an estimate of 20 minutes, she agrees. During the ride, she alternates between asking the driver to speed up and slow down, showing she's anxious or particular about the journey.

images.prompt_used:
# High-quality Korean webtoon style scene illustration

A young Korean woman in her early 20s standing on a Seoul street at night, raising her hand to hail a taxi, wearing a beige oversized knit cardigan over a white slim-fit turtleneck with delicate gold necklace, soft wavy shoulder-length brown hair with subtle highlights, natural makeup with coral lip tint, gentle brown eyes. Behind her, a young Korean male taxi driver in his early 20s visible through the windshield of his taxi, neat short black hair styled naturally, friendly approachable expression, wearing a crisp white collared shirt with navy blue cardigan sweater, warm skin tone, gentle smile.

Night time Seoul street setting with glowing street lights, modern buildings in background, warm orange and cool blue atmospheric lighting creating cinematic night ambiance. Taxi is yellow with visible windshield showing driver inside. Woman is positioned in foreground on sidewalk, driver visible through car window in middle ground. Realistic urban environment with detailed storefronts, street signs in soft focus, asphalt road surface.

Professional webtoon illustration quality with smooth cell shading, clean precise linework, polished digital rendering. Modern manhwa art style with semi-realistic proportions. Atmospheric night lighting with warm practical lights from street lamps and cool ambient city glow. Depth of field effect with sharp focus on characters. Cinematic composition showing both characters in same unified scene. Detailed fabric textures, natural hair strands, expressive faces.

Contemporary Seoul cityscape, realistic urban details, no text, no overlays, no split screen, single cohesive nighttime taxi scene, 1080x1080 pixels.

# High-quality Korean webtoon style scene illustration

View from outside a Seoul taxi at night, looking through the driver's side window into the vehicle. In the foreground, a young Korean male taxi driver in his early 20s sits in the driver's seat, shown in side profile. He has neat short black hair styled naturally, friendly approachable expression, wearing a crisp white collared shirt with a navy blue cardigan sweater. His head is turned slightly toward the back, acknowledging his passenger. Through the taxi windows, visible in the back seat, a young Korean woman in her early 20s wearing a beige oversized knit cardigan over a white slim-fit turtleneck with a delicate gold necklace. She has soft wavy shoulder-length brown hair with subtle highlights, leaning forward slightly as she speaks to confirm the taxi's availability.

Night time Seoul street visible through all windows - blurred neon signs, street lights creating warm bokeh effects. Dark blue night sky. The taxi interior has warm overhead lighting. Car dashboard visible with meter. Realistic taxi interior details - steering wheel, rearview mirror, seats.

Professional webtoon illustration with clean linework, smooth cell shading, atmospheric nighttime lighting. Depth of field effect with focus on the characters. Reflections on car windows from street lights. Modern manhwa cinematic composition. Warm color palette with cool night tones outside contrasting with warm interior lighting. Detailed fabric textures, natural character proportions, expressive faces showing polite interaction.

1080x1080 pixels, no text, no sparkles, unified scene showing both characters in the same taxi environment.

# High-quality Korean webtoon style scene illustration

Interior view of a Seoul taxi at night, camera positioned in the back seat looking toward the open rear passenger door. A young Korean woman in her early 20s is bending down to enter the taxi, her body mid-motion as she steps inside. She wears a beige oversized knit cardigan over a white slim-fit turtleneck with a delicate gold necklace, soft wavy shoulder-length brown hair with subtle highlights framing her face, natural makeup with coral lip tint. Her gentle brown eyes look down at the seat as she carefully enters, one hand on the door frame, friendly focused expression.

In the front driver's seat, visible from behind and in three-quarter profile as he turns his head back slightly toward the passenger, is a young Korean male taxi driver in his early 20s with neat short black hair styled naturally, wearing a crisp white collared shirt with a navy blue cardigan sweater over it. His friendly approachable face shows a gentle welcoming expression with slight smile, warm skin tone, soft masculine jawline.

Detailed taxi interior with grey fabric seats, door panel visible, taxi meter mounted on dashboard, Seoul night street lights visible through the open door creating warm ambient glow. Warm color palette with cool night tones from outside contrasting with warmer interior lighting.
